::Grimmler/Fliq::

As the shuttle gets closer to the Cybertronian Fire, Grimmler taps a 
few buttons, sending a transmission.

"Any Maximals at this battle, stay as far away from the enemy bots as 
possible. Me and Fliq are gonna make a flashy entrance, and it will 
be very dangerous. Be ready for it, cause its gonna be noticable. I 
repeat, stay away from the enemies."

The transmission is sent, encoded of course, to the Cybertronian 
Fire, and then encoded again and sent to the comm-links of every 
Maximal near the CF, using a Maximal frequency.

Grimmler and Fliq's shuttle gets closer to the CF.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He noticed what had happaned with IR. 
> He wispered to her, "When the fighting starts, be careful. The 
Matrix
> can giv you more power then you might think. When I first had the
> Autobot Matrix and became Rodimus Prime, I didn't know my own 
power, and
> I ended up tossing Galvatron across the galaxy."
> He then noticed Vehement looking him over. If this bot wanted a 
fight he
> would get the biggest one of his life.
